Front Desk Officer Job at Excel and Grace Consulting




        
    

        
        Excel and Grace Consulting is a fast-paced business consulting organization with a track record of delivering exceptional business solutions to small and medium-scale enterprises in Nigeria, Ghana, Germany, Switzerland, Canada, etc. We are certified management consultants with the International Council of Management Consulting Institutes (CMC-Global) with over 18 years of experience. Our team of experts and consultants have authored over 20 books on business management, business structure, business operations, human resources, organizational structure, employee development, money management, and so on.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Front Desk Officer
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Location: DRA, Port Harcourt - Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	Responsible for welcoming guests, managing check-ins/ check-outs, handling reservations, and providing excellent customer service at the hotel front desk.


Key Responsibilities


	Greet guests and assist with check-in and check-out.
	Manage reservations, phone calls, and guest inquiries.
	Process payments and maintain accurate records.
	Coordinate with housekeeping and maintenance on room status.
	Handle guest requests, provide information, and resolve issues.
	Maintain lobby cleanliness and follow hotel policies.


Qualifications


	High School Diploma or equivalent.
	Customer service or hospitality experience preferred.
	Good communication, computer, and multitasking skills.
	Professional, friendly, and reliable.


Salary
N150,000 monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@eandg.com.ng and  eandg.tprecruiters@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Project Monitoring Manager",
  "description": "Zigma Limited is an independent, indigenous energy company in Nigeria. Zigma&rsquo;s mission, under its CEO Funmi Ogbue, is to become the first female-led &lsquo;mini-major&rsquo; with interests in the upstream, midstream and downstream energy sectors, first in Nigeria and then in Africa more widely. Aligning with Funmi&rsquo;s passion for improving local communities, Zigma will place Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) policies at the heart of its operations and aims to become a champion for the responsible development of African energy projects&ndash;at the same time as delivering significant value to its investors and partners.

Too often, women and children in Africa suffer the worst from the over-zealous exploitation of energy resources. Zigma believes this should stop.&nbsp;Join us on our journey.&nbsp; Use the menu below to find out more about becoming a partner, an investor or a team member.&nbsp; You can find out more about our current projects and partners by using the links here.&nbsp;Together, we will show that responsible, thoughtful behaviour can make a difference.&nbsp; And deliver long term economic benefits to our investors, countries and our communities.&nbsp;

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Project Monitoring Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos

Responsibilities


	Monitor project progress and performance against established plans, schedules, and budgets.
	Implement effective project monitoring systems to track key metrics and milestones.
	Analyze project data to identify potential risks and propose mitigation strategies.
	Collaborate with project managers, and other stakeholders to ensure alignment with project objectives.
	Generate comprehensive project monitoring reports for management and stakeholders.
	Work closely with cross-functional teams to integrate project monitoring tools and technologies.
	Provide timely and accurate updates to project stakeholders on the status of ongoing projects.
	Evaluate project deliverables to ensure they meet quality standards and client expectations.
	Foster a culture of continuous improvement by identifying areas for optimization in project monitoring processes.
	Updating and maintaining document management systems and physical records.
	Maintaining the security of confidential documents.
	Gather actual data, update project schedule and develop reliable schedule forecast with support from project team.
	Liaising with managers and employees to discuss the progress of the project and address any issues that arise
	Keep the client team up to date on progress to present to the client
